price: ‘সিহঁত আটায়ে মোৰ শত্ৰু, কেৱল বিশ্বজগতৰ ৰব (আল্লাহ)ৰ বাহিৰে।
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
